description: The Ofcol Crater cotinues to get deeper and deeper.  The narrow
ledge continues to go along the side of the crater into the depth of
the ruins of New Ofcol.
5543.name: Deep Within the Ofcol Crater

description: The ledge gets a little too narrow, and it is a sheer drop down.
The ledge continues to go into the New Ofcol Crater, and the ruins of
New Ofcol.
5531.name: Down into the Ofcol Crater

description: The pathway continues down into the crator...deep into it.
5511.name: The Pathway Down

description: The Ofcol Crater cotinues to get deeper and deeper.  The narrow
ledge continues to go along the side of the crater into the depth of
the ruins of New Ofcol.
5546.name: Deep Within the Ofcol Crater

description: A large street heads from the western part of the old City to the
east, the cobble stone partially missing from spots, and long blades
of grass growing from inbetween.  On either side stood the sides of
the western city buildings, their ruins now decaying under the natural
process.  The air is still.
5558.name: The Cross Street

description: To the west is the ruins of the Blacksmith Shop, and to the east is
the front wall of the leather shop...  The rest fell into the crator.
Impy Way continues north and south.
5505.name: Impy Way

description: Deeper the ledge goes, slowly spiraling down into the New Ofcol
Crater.  Below is the shattered remains of the small city, as the
narrow ledge continues.
5534.name: Deeper following the ledge

description: The walls of this now cavern area goes into the depth of the New
Ofcol Crater.  The walls of the pathway seem to be bleeding something
green.  The pathway continues into the deepest depth of the crater.
5548.name: Cavernous Walls Bleeding of Lifestream

description: A forest surrounds this now overgrown road.  Made of cobble stone
it is now in a state of decay, as nature reclaims its lost land.  The
road heads to the north towards the mountains and what remains of the
City of Ofcol, an great farming nation destroyed by a peice of
RagNaRok.
5573.name: {rThe {RR{road to {RO{rfcol{x

description: A large street heads from the western part of the old City to the
east, the cobble stone partially missing from spots, and long blades
of grass growing from inbetween.  On either side stood the sides of
the western city buildings, their ruins now decaying under the natural
process.  The air is still.
5553.name: The Cross Street

description: You notice nothing but the village street.
It looks like the future site of a training room.
A small path leads through the rubble of New Ofcol to the center of
the crater.  Back north is a small church and a hut.
5571.name: Southern Path through the Crater

description: You stand at the small village street in Ofcol.  Before you once
stood small houses and a few people, there is nothing but burnt
ruins....
5550.name: {&[ {cM{*ain {cS{*treet {&]

description: You look up the village street noticing nothing special at all.
The ledge gets a little too narrow, and it is a sheer drop down.
The ledge continues to go into the New Ofcol Crater, and the ruins of
New Ofcol.
5529.name: Down into the Ofcol Crater

description: Deeper the ledge goes, slowly spiraling down into the New Ofcol
Crater.  Below is the shattered remains of the small city, as the
narrow ledge continues.
5539.name: Deeper following the ledge

description: The cavern continues north and south.  You walk in what was once a
cavern in the Underdark, but due to RagNaRok, it is open air.
5568.name: The Open Air Cavern Path

description: A long path leads down the sidewall of the crator, towards what was
a farm which seems to have survived.  The pathway winds downwards.
5509.name: The Pathway Down

description: You enter a small, shattered hut.  The entire house looks like a
regular house, except it has no windows and looked like it was
underground at one time.  The place is totally shook up, and messy.
You see a bookshelf filled with old books, and antique furniture.
There is boxes stacked up against the door to the west, which looks to
go to another room.  This room looks to be the only one used in a long
time, the rest of the house is blocked off.
5567.name: Istack's Hut

description: The ledge drops further down into the Ofcol Crater as it winds
about it in a spiral.  The dropoff is perilous from here, and the path
is frought with many mutated beasts.
5537.name: Deeper following the ledge

description: There is nothing but silence along this street, the cobble stone
missing and even laying next to holes.  The buildings along the street
charred from a massive fire, gutted and decaying.  Grass grows from
inbetween the cobble stones, and the sidewalks on the side.  Nature is
reclaiming what has been lost.
5557.name: The Cross Street

description: A twisted path follows along the sidewall of the crator towards
what seems to be the Temple of Ofcol, still in one peice.  The Twisted
path ends, and Raff Way starts to the east.
5523.name: Twisted Path

description: The burning ruins of the future training room......
5554.name: The future training room

description: You are able to see the small alley, really not very interesting.
A twisted path follows along the sidewall of the crator towards
what seems to be the Temple of Ofcol, still in one peice.  The Twisted
path continues downwards.
5520.name: Twisted Path

description: You are walking along a narrow ledge going down into the depth of
the New Ofcol Crater.  Below is the shattered ruins of New Ofcol,
mostly rubble.
5525.name: A ledge on the side of a huge crater

description: A twisted path follows along the sidewall of the crator towards
what seems to be the Temple of Ofcol, still in one peice.  The Twisted
path continues downwards.
5521.name: Twisted Path

description: The insides of the inn has been totally destroyed.  The people who
suffered the horrid accident lay on the floor....  Dead.  The ruins
creak a little.
5556.name: The Local Inn

description: The village square is as usual not overcrowded.
You are standing in a small shop, filled with all kinds of goods.
Here you might be able to find just the thing you're looking for.
The only exit is east to village square.
5555.name: Luxan's mixed shop

description: The village square is as usual not overcrowded.
The village square is in shambles.  Everything is just totally
pounded into nothingness.  All the old buildings now stand skeletons
of what they once were.  The inn to the north is destroyed...
5552.name: {RO{rfcol {RC{rity {RS{rquare{x

description: You see a local inn called 'The Ofcol Local Inn'. Looks nice.
A small shop with the sign 'Luxan's Mixed goods' hanging in front of it.
You see the village street of Ofcol.
To the west a small hut stands, actually a house.  The house looks
like it was well crafted, but is very worn down.  All around you is
the ruins of New Ofcol, the shattered buildings and burning rubble.
The area you stand in was a cavern in the Underdark, but now open air.
5566.name: Near A Drow Hut

description: You stand at the bottom of the New Ofcol Crater.  Up from here is
the path leading up to the surface, and all around you is the ruins of
New Ofcol, and what appears to be part of the Underdark now exposed to
air.  A few buildings stand to the south, and the center of the
crater.
5565.name: At the Bottom of the Crater

description: The Ofcol Crater cotinues to get deeper and deeper.  The narrow
ledge continues to go along the side of the crater into the depth of
the ruins of New Ofcol.
5547.name: Deep Within the Crater

description: Deeper the ledge goes, slowly spiraling down into the New Ofcol
Crater.  Below is the shattered remains of the small city, as the
narrow ledge continues.
5536.name: Deeper following the ledge

description: The burning ruins of this village street....  East from here is a
small alley leading to the other side of Ofcol, and north is what was
once the village square.
5551.name: {&[ {cM{*ain {cS{*treet {&]

description: The village square is as usual not overcrowded.
The small alley looks relative peaceful.
You see the village street eventually becoming the wide road.
The pathway continues down into the crator...deep into it.
5513.name: The Pathway Down

description: You follow what was once Impy Way.  To the east there is nothing, a
large drop into the crator.  To the west are the shattered homes.
5501.name: Impy Way

description: Deeper the ledge goes, slowly spiraling down into the New Ofcol
Crater.  Below is the shattered remains of the small city, as the
narrow ledge continues.
5540.name: Deeper following the ledge

description: There is nothing but silence along this street, the cobble stone
missing and even laying next to holes.  The buildings along the street
charred from a massive fire, gutted and decaying.  Grass grows from
inbetween the cobble stones, and the sidewalks on the side.  Nature is
reclaiming what has been lost.
5559.name: The Cross Street

description: A twisted path follows along the sidewall of the crator towards
what seems to be the Temple of Ofcol, still in one peice.  The Twisted
path continues downwards.
5518.name: Twisted Path

description: Deeper the ledge goes, slowly spiraling down into the New Ofcol
Crater.  Below is the shattered remains of the small city, as the
narrow ledge continues.
5532.name: Deeper following the ledge

description: You stand near what was the Big Intersection in New Ofcol.  Now
only a huge fucking crator replaces all that was here....
5500.name: Big Intersection

description: The pathway continues down into the crator...  Deep into it.
5510.name: The Pathway Down

description: A twisted path follows along the sidewall of the crator towards
what seems to be the Temple of Ofcol, still in one peice.  The Twisted
path continues downwards.
5517.name: Twisted Path

description: You follow what was once Impy Way.  To the east there is nothing, a
large drop into the crater.  To the west are the shattered homes.
5503.name: Impy Way

description: A twisted path follows along the sidewall of the crator towards
what seems to be the Temple of Ofcol, still in one peice.  The Twisted
path continues downwards.
5516.name: Twisted Path

description: The Ofcol Crater cotinues to get deeper and deeper.  The narrow
ledge continues to go along the side of the crater into the depth of
the ruins of New Ofcol.
5545.name: Deep Within the Ofcol Crater

description: Deeper the ledge goes, slowly spiraling down into the New Ofcol
Crater.  Below is the shattered remains of the small city, as the
narrow ledge continues.
5533.name: Deeper following the ledge

description: A small path leads off of what is left of New Ofcol on the surface.
Before you the path winds slowly on a small ledge, going down to the
bottom of the New Ofcol Crater.  Far below you can see the ruins of
New Ofcol, and a few standing and strange buildings.
5524.name: A ledge on the side of a huge crater

description: You are at the end of Impy and of the city part of Ofcol.  Behind
you is the burning ruins of the city, still smoking.  To the west is
broken up fields, and the road to the east seems to lead into a
strange area.
5508.name: End of impy Way

description: Before you stands a church once dedicated to the Spider Queen,
Lloth.  Her spidery figure reflected in the statues in the temple.
The roof of the temple is broken up, and spots of light shine in.
Damage from RagNaRok.
5570.name: The Ruins Of A Church Of Lloth

description: To the west is the ruins of the Ofcol Pawn Shop, and to the east
was where the Ofcol Meat Store was.  Impy Way continues north and
south.
5506.name: Impy Way

description: You are walking along a narrow ledge going down into the depth of
the New Ofcol Crater.  Below is the shattered ruins of New Ofcol,
mostly rubble.  A dropoff is here, allowing access to the smoldering
rubble far below.
5527.name: A dropoff into the crater

description: You are walking along a narrow ledge going down into the depth of
the New Ofcol Crater.  Below is the shattered ruins of New Ofcol,
mostly rubble.
5526.name: A ledge on the side of a huge crater

description: A forest surrounds this now overgrown road.  Made of cobble stone
it is now in a state of decay, as nature reclaims its lost land.  The
road heads to the north towards the mountains and what remains of the
City of Ofcol, an great farming nation destroyed by a peice of
RagNaRok.
5575.name: {rThe {RR{road to {RO{rfcol{x

description: A twisted path follows along the sidewall of the crator towards
what seems to be the Temple of Ofcol, still in one peice.  The Twisted
path continues downwards.
5515.name: Twisted Path

description: You are on the intersection of Impy Way and Swiftest Way.  To the
north is the ruins of a big house.  Swiftest Way runs west, and use to
run east.  Shattered homes to the west, the crator to the right.
5504.name: Big Intersection

description: The Ofcol Crater cotinues to get deeper and deeper.  The narrow
ledge continues to go along the side of the crater into the depth of
the ruins of New Ofcol.
5541.name: Deep Within the Ofcol Crater

description: The walls of this now cavern area goes into the depth of the New
Ofcol Crater.  The walls of the pathway seem to be bleeding something
green.  The pathway continues into the deepest depth of the crater.
5561.name: Cavernous Walls Bleeding of Lifestream

description: The pathway continues down into the crator...deep into it.
5512.name: The Pathway Down

description: The Ofcol Crater cotinues to get deeper and deeper.  The narrow
ledge continues to go along the side of the crater into the depth of
the ruins of New Ofcol.
5542.name: Deep Within the Ofcol Crater

description: The ledge gets a little too narrow, and it is a sheer drop down.
The ledge continues to go into the New Ofcol Crater, and the ruins of
New Ofcol.
5528.name: Down into the Ofcol Crater

description: You follow what was once Impy Way.  To the east there is nothing, a
large drop into the crator.  To the west are the shattered homes.
5502.name: Impy Way

description: A twisted path follows along the sidewall of the crator towards
what seems to be the Temple of Ofcol, still in one peice.  The Twisted
path continues downwards.
5519.name: Twisted Path

description: A twisted path follows along the sidewall of the crator towards
what seems to be the Temple of Ofcol, still in one peice.  The Twisted
path continues downwards.
5522.name: Twisted Path

description: The walls of this now cavern area goes into the depth of the New
Ofcol Crater.  The walls of the pathway seem to be bleeding something
green.  The pathway continues into the deepest depth of the crater.
5562.name: Cavernous Walls Bleeding of Lifestream

description: The walls of this now cavern area goes into the depth of the New
Ofcol Crater.  The walls of the pathway seem to be bleeding something
green.  The pathway continues into the deepest depth of the crater.
5560.name: Cavernous Walls Bleeding of Lifestream

description: This was once an underground cavern part of the Underdark, but now
due to RagNaRok is open air.  The rubble of New Ofcol surrounds the
area, except for what was this cave.  To the south a path continues to
the center of the crater, and to the east is a small church.
5569.name: The Open Air Cavern Path

description: The ledge drops further down into the Ofcol Crater as it winds
about it in a spiral.  The dropoff is perilous from here, and the path
is frought with many mutated beasts.
5538.name: Deeper following the ledge

description: The ledge gets a little too narrow, and it is a sheer drop down.
The ledge continues to go into the New Ofcol Crater, and the ruins of
New Ofcol.
5530.name: Down into the Ofcol Crater

description: Deeper the ledge goes, slowly spiraling down into the New Ofcol
Crater.  Below is the shattered remains of the small city, as the
narrow ledge continues.
5535.name: Deeper following the ledge

description: You stand at the bottom of the crater, the entire landscape before
you slopes upwards in what was once New Ofcol.  The shattered ruins of
houses and buildings surrounds this area.  In the center a smooth
black rock sticks up, with a card imbedded in it.
5572.name: At the Bottom of the Ofcol Crater

description: The walls of this now cavern area goes into the depth of the New
Ofcol Crater.  The walls of the pathway seem to be bleeding something
green.  The pathway continues into the deepest depth of the crater.
5549.name: Cavernous Walls Bleeding of Lifestream

description: A forest surrounds this now overgrown road.  Made of cobble stone
it is now in a state of decay, as nature reclaims its lost land.  The
road heads to the north towards the mountains and what remains of the
City of Ofcol, an great farming nation destroyed by a peice of
RagNaRok.
5574.name: {rThe {RR{road to {RO{rfcol{x

description: A large gated wall stands 10 feet above the ground, the forest to
the south only a few feet away from it.  Wild vines climb the walls,
covering a good portion of it.  The gates stand open, one hanging off
its hinges.  Made of iron they are slowly rusting away.  Inside the
sites of an old city stand, grass and nature growing wild.  Carved in
the stone frame of the gate reads "Ofcol".
5563.name: {R-{r[ The {RG{rates of {RO{rfcol {r]{R-{x

description: To the west is the ruins of Nyles' House of Ale, and the Farmer's
Market was to the east.  Impy Way ends a little to the south, but the
crator looks like it takes out part of the road.
5507.name: Impy Way

description: The pathway continues down into the crator...deep into it.
5514.name: The Pathway Down

description: The Ofcol Crater cotinues to get deeper and deeper.  The narrow
ledge continues to go along the side of the crater into the depth of
the ruins of New Ofcol.
5544.name: Deep Within the Ofcol Crater

description: The walls of this now cavern area goes into the depth of the New
Ofcol Crater.  The walls of the pathway seem to be bleeding something
green.  The pathway continues into the deepest depth of the crater.
5564.name: Nearing the Lifestream?

description:
This creature is a small, bipedal demon, with the characteristic
curved horns, jagged fangs and scaly skin.  It is extremely agile, and
can jump several times its own height into the air.  Worst of all, it
seems to be ill-behaved.
5520.room_name: A small mutant demon snarls at you.
5520.name: A New Ofcol Crator Demon~

description:
Before you stands a very old drow in his age, which could be
a few thousand years.  His hair is white and he has a long
beard running down his front.  He sits in the chair, staring
at the door and grumbling.  He doesn't look too happy.
5567.room_name: A drow sits in his chair, grumbling to himself.
5567.name: Istack The Wise & Forgetful~
subroutines:
M speech 5507 treasure~
M speech 5508 slaver stew~
M give 5509 1350~
